og.description: On Wednesday, the House Appropriations Subcommittee on Labor, Health and Human Services, Education, and Related Agencies voted to deny funding to the Department of Labor for enforcement or implementation of its fiduciary rule.
og.title: House Committee Blocks Nanny-State IRA Rule

twitter.description: On Wednesday, the House Appropriations Subcommittee on Labor, Health and Human Services, Education, and Related Agencies voted to deny funding to the Department of Labor for enforcement or implementation of its fiduciary rule.
twitter.title: House Committee Blocks Nanny-State IRA Rule
